title: Césaire's statement above was most likely made...

content.prompt: Césaire’s statement above was most likely made in response to

choices.label: the growing superpower influence in Africa and Asia during the Cold War
the success of the Indian independence movement
European colonizers’ claim that their rule had improved life in the colonies
leaders of the decolonization movement arguing for the adoption of parliamentary democracy after achieving independence

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
